categories.title: Recent Pull Requests in the elizaOS/eliza Repository

content.text:
Several pull requests have been submitted to the elizaOS/eliza repository, focusing on new features, testing improvements, and documentation updates:

- PR #4096 by hishboy introduces a Farcaster plugin for v2, expanding the platform's integration capabilities.

- PR #4099 by tcm390 adds a new community manager feature, which should enhance community engagement and management functionality.

- Multiple PRs focus on testing improvements:
  • PR #4089 by HarshModi2005 adds tests for the project-starter directory
  • PR #4092 by Y4NK33420 contributes extensive UI tests
  • PR #4090 by Samarthsinghal28 adds tests for each agent type in the-org package
  • PR #4100 by harshal247 resolves failing CLI test cases

- PR #4104 by madjin updates the documentation, ensuring users have access to current information.

categories.title: Recent Updates to the Eliza Project

content.text:
The Eliza project has seen several improvements across different areas:

**Documentation and Testing Enhancements**
JSDoc documentation has been updated across 62 files (PR #4078), improving code documentation. The testing framework has been strengthened with updates to CLI tests based on PR comments (PR #4075) and the addition of tests for each agent type in the-org package (PR #4090).

**Feature Additions and Enhancements**
A new community manager feature has been implemented (PR #4099), and the Telegram plugin has been enhanced (PR #4098).

**Bug Fixes and Optimizations**
A settings action bug has been fixed (PR #4085), and the log level for null/undefined encryption/decryption errors has been reduced to minimize unnecessary logging (PR #4103).

categories.title: Recent Issues in the elizaOS/eliza GitHub Repository

content.text:
Several issues have been reported in the elizaOS/eliza GitHub repository:

1. Issue #4094 reports problems with building the project on Windows systems.

2. Issue #4101 describes a dependency error where the system cannot find a matching version for @elizaos/plugin-sql@^0.25.6, resulting in an npm error.

3. Issue #4102 indicates problems with links and hashtags not appearing properly in Twitter posts.

4. Issue #4097 questions whether the ENABLE_TWITTER_POST_GENERATION configuration option is still being used in the project.

Over the past two days (March 27-29, 2025), the elizaos/eliza repository showed significant activity. There were a total of 12 new pull requests, with 7 of them being successfully merged. The repository also received 4 new issues during this period. The project maintained strong community engagement with 10-12 active contributors working on the codebase.
sources: From 2025-03-27 to 2025-03-28, elizaos/eliza had 7 new PRs (2 merged), 1 new issues, and 12 active contributors.
From 2025-03-28 to 2025-03-29, elizaos/eliza had 5 new PRs (5 merged), 3 new issues, and 10 active contributors.
